description: Try a new take on the classic Sunday roast with this garlic and sage roast chicken recipe. Complete the dish with vegetables like potatoes or broccolini.
keywords: Roast chicken,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Jun 2020,Winter,Sesame free,Budget,Potato,May 2020,Broccolini,Christmas,Soy free,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Garlic & Sage Roast Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg washed white potatoes, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Place potato in a large saucepan, cover with cold water and bring to the boil over high heat. Drain, then transfer to a shallow roasting pan. Add stock, garlic and lemon halves and juice. Drizzle over oil and season.

Pat chicken dry with paper towel. Tie legs together with kitchen string, season, then place on top of potato and bake, adding sage and butter to pan in last 10 minutes of cooking, for 1 hour or until chicken juices run clear when thickest part of thigh is pierced with a skewer. Serve with broccolini.
